content: **from the yarnspirations webpage ** *watch the compliments roll in when you wear this magnificent crochet wrap layer it over a coat or any outfit for added warmth on chilly days fashioned with a rich finish thanks to heart fiesta and red heart super saver its 54 x 60 size is ample enough for a sophisticated look that envelops you in style the best part is it s beginner level so only you ll know how easy it was to make * **skill level ** beginner **from the website ** wear this sophisticated wrap over a coat or suit for added warmth and style on chilly days **supplies ** red heart® fiesta® art e704 6 ounce/330 yard skein 29 ounces no 6012 black ca red heart® super saver® art e300 6 ounce/348 yard skein 29 ounces no 312 black cb **or** red heart® super saver® art e300 6 ounce/348 yard skein 58 ounces no 312 black **gauge ** 4 groups of single_crochet chain 2 single_crochet = 5 6 row = 4 with double strand of yarn
